alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 5:58AM AKST until November 29 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop this this afternoon continue into Wednesday morning. Winds increasing this afternoon will cause blowing snow with reduced visibility in many areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
